alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 5:22PM CDT until May 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Southern Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crawford, or 15 miles southeast of Starkville, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Crawford around 525 PM CDT. Brooksville and Deerbrook around 535 PM CDT. Macon around 555 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
